description:
One day, Jintan (Jinta Yadomi), a teenage shut-in, suddenly finds himself face-to-face with his childhood friend, Menma (Meiko Honma). After struggling with Menma`s request to have her (unknown) wish granted, Jintan meets with his former friends. Soon, she recalls that the dream was to have their friends all together again.
Source: crunchyroll
